RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 1 4F Dirt CR: 55. Claiming Purse 7150. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MO ARETHA was never far back, advanced to the turn, rallied five wide and wore down DEVINE CANDY to get up late and was all out at the wire. DEVINE CANDY bumped at the start, was sent to the front to set the pace to deep stretch and was outfinished in a good effort. CAROLS KITTEN raced mid pack, went seven wide leaving the turn, found her best stride late, was gaining ground and up late for show. HUSHED stalked the pace along the inside, bid off the rail, went willingly to the wire, didn't have enough late and was caught for third. EUROBOUTTOGETIT was never far off the pace, raced inside and lacked the needed late response. FLASHY GAIL broke out to be away slowly, went widest in the drive and failed to threaten. SHE'S A PLAYER broke slowly, angled out into the turn, passed a tiring rival and was not urged in the stretch. BOUJEE BRITT pressed the pace to the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Eurobouttogetit
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced inside, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, angled out into turn, not urged stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Aretha
ENTRY.COMMENT: advanced to turn, rallied 5w, wore down rival, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Gail
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, off slowly, slow early, widest in drive, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Hushed
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, bid off rail, willingly to wire, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Devine Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pace to deep stretch, outfinished, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Carols Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, 7w leaving turn, best stride late, gaining fast

ENTRY.NAME: Boujee Britt
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to turn, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 4950. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 19, 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CATALE STORM was last away, rallied three across on the first turn, assumed command and inched away into the backstretch, continued to set the pace and held well in a driving finish. RECKLESSNESS was taken back from between horses entering the backstretch, pressed the pace, swung wide leaving the second turn, closed once straightened and finished second best. REMEMBER ME TONY raced close to the pace, lacked a late rally and settled for show.

ENTRY.NAME: Remember Me Tony
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, lacked a late rally, settled for show

ENTRY.NAME: Recklessness
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back into backstretch, swung wide turn, closed, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Catale Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, rallied 3across 1st turn, inched clear, set pace, held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OKLAHOMA STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YANKEE INDIAN was pushed out at the start, pressed the pace, closed steadily and wore down ROBERT WHO to get up late. ROBERT WHO broke out, set the pace, led to deep stretch and was outfinished despite steady urging. SWEET BAKER raced close to the pace, fell back on the backstretch to race mid pack, rallied on the turn, bid three wide and closed to get up for show while no threat to the top two. BRICKTOWN BROWN raced inside, was always within range, lacked a rally and was outfinished for third. MONET'S DEVIL angled out on the first turn, swung wide entering the backstretch, angled back in on the second turn, bid inside and had little left. SAZON showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Monet's Devil
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying B Ranch Cattle Company LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: swung wide into backstretch, angled out in 2nd turn, inside bid

ENTRY.NAME: Sazon
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to contend, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Bricktown Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced inside, within range, lacked a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Baker
ENTRY.COMMENT: close early, fell back backstretch, 3w bid, closed, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Robert Who
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, set pace, led to deep stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Yankee Indian
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out start, pressed, steady close, wore down rival, up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $5,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HE'S MUNNIE vied two across to the second turn, drew clear and held safely in a driving finish. BROTHER AARON settled off the pace while racing outside, closed willingly, didn't have enough left and held for place. LARCH saved ground, angled out into the second turn, swung wide and finished well. WIN FOR FUN was away alertly, was hustled along to vie along the inside, was steadied on the second turn, fell back and continued willingly to the wire. SHANGHAI SKIPPER was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Win for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, hustled along, vied inside, steadied 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Larch
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled out into 2nd turn, swung wide, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Skipper
ENTRY.COMMENT: in the back, no factor, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: He's Munnie
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across, drew clear 2nd turn, held safely, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Karen Yeamans Racing Stable & Peggy Hopwood

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Aaron
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, closed willingly, not enough left, held for 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 92. Handicap Purse 19250. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD. NO NOMINATION OR ENTRY FEES. WEIGHTS TO BE ASSIGNED AT THE DRAW.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ABSAROKA set the pace and held well while under pressure late. DRIFTING WEST chased the pace, couldn't gain on the winner and finished second best. ROYALLY was unhurried early and raced in the back, rallied into the far turn, bid inside and closed to earn show. UNRESTRICTED was void of early speed, swung wide entering the stretch and offered a mild bid only. BOX SEAT raced mid pack towards the outside and failed to menace in an even effort. PALATIAL TIMES stalked the pace to the far turn, tired and gave way. PINKY RING BLING was hustled along, angled out on the first turn, raced in close, tired into far turn and stopped. HOOVES YOUR DADDY was crowded on the first turn, dropped back, lacked a bid and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Pinky Ring Bling
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, angled out 1st turn, in close, tired into far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Drifting West
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, couldn't gain, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Royally
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, bid inside far turn, closed, earned show

ENTRY.NAME: Absaroka
ENTRY.OWNER: Covey Seth and Caldwell J R
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, held well, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Hooves Your Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded 1st turn, dropped back, lacked a bid, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Unrestricted
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, swung wide into stretch, mild bid only

ENTRY.NAME: Box Seat
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, raced outside, even effort, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Palatial Times
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked to far turn, tired, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 6600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELECTORAL settled off the pace, bid inside into the second turn, shifted out, challenged for the lead, drew clear and held safely under mild urging. EXCITING raced along the inside, was in hand to the first turn, assumed command, drew clear to set the pace to the second turn, was outclosed and finished second best. STEPPIN SHEP broke out, led to the first turn, pressed the pace to the second turn, leveled off and settled for show. LIMBO'S PROMISE was in tight entering the first turn, saved ground and lacked a bid. NOMOREMRNICEGUY raced in the back in an even effort and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Exciting
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand to 1st turn, took command, headed 2nd turn, outclosed

ENTRY.NAME: Limbo's Promise
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight into 1st turn, saved ground, lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Nomoremrniceguy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in the back, even effort, failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Electoral
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid inside 2nd turn, shifted out, challenged, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Steppin Shep
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, led early, pressed to 2nd turn, leveled off, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OKLAHOMA STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEEDABETTERJOCK broke in and bumped at the start, vied to the second turn and drew clear under urging. HUNTER QUICK vied two across to the second turn, fell back, was outclosed and finished second best. MAJOR GRIFFIN was unhurried early, was taken outside, raced six wide along the backstretch, rallied on the turn and got up for show. MEGA BOND raced close to the pace along the inside, backed up on the turn and went evenly late to lose position. DEL MOON broke out and bumped at the start, saved ground to the turn, shifted out, bid off the rail and failed to gain. MOROLICIOUS bumped and was squeezed at the start, showed speed to the second turn and flattened out.

ENTRY.NAME: Major Griffin
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, raced wide, rallied turn, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Mega Bond
ENTRY.OWNER: Higgins William H and Davidson M Brent
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, raced inside, backed up turn, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Del Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, saved ground to turn, shifted out,bid off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Morolicious
ENTRY.OWNER: Davidson Sarah Sanders Carlton Blake and Sanders Colton
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, speed to 2nd turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Needabetterjock
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped, vied to 2nd turn, drew clear, under urging

ENTRY.NAME: Hunter Quick
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied to 2nd turn, fell back, outclosed, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 21120. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BREDS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELY LOLITA was sent to the front, led throughout and held safely while kept to task. SECRET PASS chased the pace, challenged for the lead on the second turn, fell back and finished second best. SMOKING GUITAR bumped after the start, was never far off the pace, rallied around the turn, bid seven wide and got up for show. LENA'S SHADOW bumped after the start, was getting out on the first turn and was checked, advanced to the second turn, bid and didn't have enough left. EXCETERA raced close to the pace along the inside, had a clear path at the top of the lane, lacked a response and fell back. HARPERS VISION swung wide on the first turn and trailed the field.

ENTRY.NAME: Lena's Shadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped after start, getting out, checked 1st turn,bid, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Smoking Guitar
ENTRY.OWNER: Kester John Buehrer Mark W and Castor Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped after start, rallied around turn, 7wide bid, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Excetera
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, raced inside, no stretch response, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Harpers Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: swung wide 1st turn, trailed, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, challenged 2nd turn, fell back, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lolita
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to front, led throughout, kept to task

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Muscogee (Creek) Nation S. FAIR MEADOWS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 76. Stakes Purse 45000. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES, THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD. (Includes $5,000 from the OKB Program). Three-Year-Olds, 118 lbs. Older, 124 lbs. Nominations closed Thursday, July 6, with fourteen (14). $250 due at time of entry. Starters to pass the entry box by the usual time of closing. (Horses with highest earnings in 2022-23 preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAGAN'S JET set the pace, drew off on the second turn for a clear lead and held safely in a driving finish. STORMIEIS BLUE saved ground, finished well inside and gained late. LA MORENA lagged early, rallied into the second turn, bid eight wide and closed to get up for show. STORMY BISONETTE was never far back, bid seven wide, closed well and didn't have enough late. GENUINE DRAFT got away well, stalked the pace to the second turn, swung wide and gave way. YAK ATTACK was through early, eased and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Ragan's Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off 2nd turn, clear lead, held safely, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormieis Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, finished well inside, late gain,

ENTRY.NAME: Genuine Draft
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, stalked to 2nd turn, swung wide, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Bisonette
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, 7wide bid, closed, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: La Morena
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged early, rallied into 2nd turn, 8wide bid, closed, up for 3d

ENTRY.NAME: Yak Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: eased, awalked off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 10 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 17050. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Horses That Started For a Claiming Price of $7,500 Or Less In Their Last Three Starts Least Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LANGMEAD set a pressured pace to the second turn and drew clear. SPIN TO WIN moved up three wide on the backstretch to press the pace to the second turn, fell back and finished second best. BINDING HEART pressed the pace around the first turn, fell back, bid inside on the second turn, earned show and was clearly best of the rest. LITTLE MAD MAX got away well, showed good early speed, was through early and dropped back. BIG BUDDS BROWN bore out on the first turn, raced in the back in an even effort and was outrun. POWER PROJECTION was carried out on the first turn and trailed the field.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Mad Max
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, good early speed, through early, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Budds Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out 1st turn, in the back, even effort, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Spin to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up backstretch, pressed pace, fell back turn, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Power Projection
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out 1st turn, trailed, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Langmead
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace to 2nd turn, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Binding Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed around 1st turn, fell back, bid inside, best of rest
